page.title: 17ST. PETER'S CHURCH WALL
page.content: Church Wall {----------- } The P.C.C of East Bridgford reported that a crack in the church wall was not safe so the Notts County Council sent some men to examine the matter. While these men were looking at it they noticed a bulge further down the wall which looked more serious. The price of repair is at four figures.The estimate of the wall is 25m.Work commenced and Trent Lane was closed to traffic.As they worked,more of the wall collapsed.The new wall is going to be between 1.25m to 1.5m thick.Fortunately the county council will be paying.::::::::::::::::::::::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
